name: .OGMO
summary: Learn about .OGMO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an OGMO file with OGMO Editor (multiplatform). Doing so will open the level editor project your OGMO file defines.
You can also open an OGMO file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text or source code editor. Doing so will allow you to view the JSON data your OGMO file contains.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ogmo file in OGMO Editor
images.caption: OGMO file open in OGMO Editor

images.alt: OGMO file open in Apple TextEdit
images.caption: OGMO file open in Apple TextEdit
